room_title: Escape room "The Detective's Office" by Escape Hour Charlotte in Charlotte
room_description: Detective Herlock Sholmes, a very distant relative of the infamous Sherlock Holmes, has locked you in his office as you await interrogation. Sholmes is convinced that at least one in your group is the mastermind behind a series of thefts. Prove yourselves innocent and escape the office confines or risk ending up permanently locked up!
